string.name: skill_details_title
string.translation_description: Title for the skill details screen where the user can see the details for a specific skill.

string.translation_description: Title for the champion details screen where the user can see the details for a specific champion.

string.translation_description: Title for the skill details screen where the user can see the details for a specific skill.

string.name: champions_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Champions' screen where the user can see the list of champions available in BB.

string.name: skills_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Skills' screen where the user can see a list of skills available in BB.

string.name: a11y_champion_item_image
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for each of the champion images shown in the 'Champions' screen.

string.name: champion_detail_image_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the header / hero image that is show at the top of the champion detail screen.

string.name: watering_needs_prefix
string.translation_description: Prefix for the text describing how often a plant should be watered. Used in combination with watering_needs_suffix.

string.name: gallery_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the clickable image to navigate to the gallery screen
